item.description:
Report X-2025040544

  • City: SPOKANE

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOADER FOUND PACKAGE AT BOTTOM OF WALL, LOADED ON THE GROUND. THERE WAS A SMALL LEAK AT BOTTOM OF METAL PAIL. RESPONDER IN FULL PPE, RESPONDED TO LEAK. METAL PAIL WAS FOUND TO HAVE A BENT PART AT THE SEAM, CAUSING A SMALL LEAK.

item.title: Report X-2025040099
item.description:
Report X-2025040099

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-31
  • City: SEATAC AIRPORT
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment came from LAS with a stopover in SEA and FAI as final destination. Ramp agent was doing screening training and randomly chose this shipment to xray. During screening he found 3 aerosol cans in one of the totes. Looked up screening process in LAS, it was screened by K9.
